jobs.title: Senior React Engineer
jobs.summary: Join our team as a Senior React Engineer and help build scalable, performant web applications for our clients.
jobs.description: We're looking for an experienced React engineer who can lead complex frontend projects and mentor junior developers. You'll work directly with clients to understand their needs and translate them into elegant, maintainable solutions.
responsibilities: Lead frontend architecture decisions for client projects
Build reusable component libraries and design systems
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
Collaborate with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs
Participate in client meetings and technical discovery
requirements: Strong understanding of web performance optimization

jobs.title: Product Strategist
jobs.summary: Help our clients define and execute product strategies that drive business growth.
jobs.description: As a Product Strategist at Drexus, you'll work with founders and product leaders to shape product vision, validate ideas, and create actionable roadmaps. You'll combine strategic thinking with hands-on execution to deliver meaningful outcomes.
responsibilities: Lead product discovery and user research
Bridge business goals with technical implementation
requirements: 3+ years in product management or strategy
Ability to work with technical teams

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.summary: Build and maintain infrastructure that powers applications serving millions of users.
jobs.description: We're seeking a DevOps engineer who can design and implement robust, scalable infrastructure solutions. You'll work across multiple client projects, ensuring reliability, security, and performance.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Kubernetes and Docker

jobs.title: Junior Product Designer
jobs.summary: Start your design career working on diverse projects with experienced mentors.
jobs.description: This is an excellent opportunity for a talented junior designer to grow their skills across various industries and project types. You'll receive mentorship from senior designers while contributing to real client projects.
responsibilities: Maintain design systems and component libraries
Learn and apply design best practices
requirements: Basic understanding of web/mobile design patterns
Eagerness to learn and receive feedback
niceToHave: Degree in design or related field

jobs.title: Technical Project Manager
jobs.summary: Lead complex technical projects and ensure successful delivery for our enterprise clients.
jobs.description: We need an experienced Technical Project Manager who can handle multiple concurrent projects, manage stakeholder expectations, and ensure on-time, on-budget delivery. Technical background required to effectively communicate with engineering teams.
responsibilities: Create and maintain project plans and timelines
Facilitate communication between clients and teams
Report on project status and metrics
